page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: {St.Martin of Tours RC Church:}Father Somers has been the parish priest for 15 years. On June 10th he celebrated forty years in the priesthood.Before coming to Tranent he lived at Blanefield,Stirlingshire.1000 members 40% are young people.{Methodist Church Rev Mr Pepper has been minister for 6 years.He has 130 members - 20% young people. {Old Parish Church - }Rev Mr Millar has been in the parish for 32 years.Before coming to TRANENT he worked in Nigeria.Of 900 members 50% are young people.{Baptist Church }- Rev Mr Reddoch is from Dallas,Texas. He has been here for 7 months.24 members.{Salvation Army }- Miss Ritchie has been in the Army for 53 years.10 members.She travels all over the world even though she is nearly eighty.{Jehovahs }Mr Neilson has been here for 25yrs.35 members.
